name: gdax
description: An adapter to connect Via to the GDAX exchange.
author: Dakota Gordon

accountName.description: Give this account a short name for your own personal reference.

profile.description: The type of API key that you created (probably default, unless you know that it's margin).

apiKey.title: API Key
apiKey.description: The API key generated by GDAX (approximately 32 characters).

apiSecret.title: Secret Key
apiSecret.description: The API secret key generated by GDAX (approximately 88 characters).

apiPassphrase.title: Passphrase
apiPassphrase.description: The passphrase that you entered when you created your API key.
